questions: Posters of the local rock band were displayed in store windows to promote the sale of their _____ tickets.
Maria didn’t want to deliver the bad news to David about his failing the job interview. She herself was quite _____ about it.
The newcomer speaks with a strong Irish _____; he must be from Ireland.
Although Maggie has been physically _____ to her wheelchair since the car accident, she does not limit herself to indoor activities.
All passengers riding in cars are required to fasten their seatbelts in order to reduce the risk of _____ in case of an accident.
The principal of this school is a man of exceptional _____. He sets aside a part of his salary for a scholarship fund for children from needy families.
The science teacher always _____ the use of the laboratory equipment before she lets her students use it on their own.
Most of the area is covered by woods, where bird species are so _____ that it is a paradise for birdwatchers.
In most cases, the committee members can reach agreement quickly. _____,  however, they differ greatly in opinion and have a hard time making decisions.
Many people try to save a lot of money before _____, since having enough money would give them a sense of security for their future.
In winter, our skin tends to become dry and _____, a problem which is usually treated by applying lotions or creams.
Benson married Julie soon after he had _____ her heart and gained her parents’ approval.
The recent flood completely _____ my parents’ farm. The farmhouse and fruit trees were all gone and nothing was left.
The results of this survey are not reliable because the people it questioned were not a typical or _____ sample of the entire population that was studied.
In line with the worldwide green movement, carmakers have been working hard to make their new models more _____ friendly to reduce pollution.
Nowadays many companies adopt a ______ work schedule which allows their employees to decide when to arrive at work—from as early as 6 a.m. to as late as 11 a.m.
To teach children right from wrong, some parents will ______ their children when they behave well and punish them when they misbehave.
To stick to a tight budget, Robert bought a more ______ LED TV instead of a fancy, expensive 3D TV.
David’s new book made it to the best-seller list because of its beautiful ______ and amusing stories.
The airport was closed because of the snowstorm, and our ______ for Paris had to be delayed until the following day.
The moment the students felt the earthquake, they ran ______ out of the classroom to an open area outside.
The ______ capacity of this elevator is 400 kilograms. For safety reasons, it shouldn’t be overloaded.
An open display of ______ behavior between men and women, such as hugging and kissing, is not allowed in some conservative societies.
When taking medicine, we should read the instructions on the ______ carefully because they provide important information such as how and when to take it.
The angry passengers argued ______ with the airline staff because their flight was cancelled without any reason.
To ______ the new product, the company offered some free samples before they officially launched it.
I was worried about my first overseas trip, but my father ______ me that he would help plan the trip so that nothing would go wrong.
The recent cooking oil scandals have led to calls for tougher ______ of sales of food products.
John should ______ more often with his friends and family after work, instead of staying in his room to play computer games.
To prevent the spread of the Ebola virus from West Africa to the rest of the world, many airports have begun Ebola ______ for passengers from the infected areas.
Lost and scared, the little dog _______ along the streets, looking for its master.
On a sunny afternoon last month, we all took off our shoes and walked on the grass with _______ feet.
It is both legally and _______ wrong to spread rumors about other people on the Internet.
These warm-up exercises are designed to help people _______ their muscles and prevent injuries.
Mei-ling has a very close relationship with her parents. She always _______ them before she makes important decisions.
The restaurant has a _______ charge of NT$250 per person. So the four of us need to pay at least NT$1,000 to eat there.
At the Book Fair, exhibitors from 21 countries will _______ textbooks, novels, and comic books.
Before John got on the stage to give the speech, he took a deep _______ to calm himself down.
Most young people in Taiwan are not satisfied with a high school _______ and continue to pursue further education in college.
Residents are told not to dump all household waste _______ into the trash can; reusable materials should first be sorted out and recycled.
Kevin had been standing on a ladder trying to reach for a book on the top shelf when he lost his _______ and fell to the ground.
If student enrollment continues to drop, some programs at the university may be _______ to reduce the operation costs.
People in that remote village feed themselves by hunting and engaging in _______ forms of agriculture. No modern agricultural methods are used.
The government issued a travel _______ for Taiwanese in response to the outbreak of civil war in Syria.
The baby panda Yuan Zai at the Taipei Zoo was separated from her mother because of a minor injury that occurred during her birth. She was _______ by zookeepers for a while.
It rained so hard yesterday that the baseball game had to be _______ until next Saturday.
As more people rely on the Internet for information, it has ________ newspapers as the most important source of news.
Having saved enough money, Joy ________ two trips for this summer vacation, one to France and the other to Australia.
Since I do not fully understand your proposal, I am not in the position to make any _______ on it.
Betty was _______ to accept her friend’s suggestion because she thought she could come up with a better idea herself.
The bank tries its best to attract more customers. Its staff members are always available to provide _______ service.
John’s part-time experience at the cafeteria is good _______ for running his own restaurant.
Women’s fashions are _______ changing: One season they may favor pantsuits, but the next season they may prefer miniskirts.
Standing on the seashore, we saw a ______ of seagulls flying over the ocean before they glided down and settled on the water.
The book is not only informative but also _______, making me laugh and feel relaxed while reading it.
After working in front of my computer for the entire day, my neck and shoulders got so _______ that I couldn’t even turn my head.
Getting a flu shot before the start of flu season gives our body a chance to build up protection against the _______ that could make us sick.
The kingdom began to _______ after the death of its ruler, and was soon taken over by a neighboring country.
Though Kevin failed in last year’s singing contest, he did not feel ______. This year he practiced day and night and finally won first place in the competition.
Emma and Joe are looking for a live-in babysitter for their three-year-old twins, ______ one who knows how to cook.
The ending of the movie did not come as a _____ to John because he had already read the novel that the movie was based on.
In order to stay healthy and fit, John exercises _____. He works out twice a week in a gym.
Traveling is a good way for us to _____ different cultures and broaden our horizons.
The story about Hou-I shooting down nine suns is a well-known Chinese _____, but it may not be a true historical event.
According to recent research, children under the age of 12 are generally not _____ enough to recognize risk and deal with dangerous situations.
Helen let out a sigh of ______ after hearing that her brother was not injured in the accident.
Research suggests that people with outgoing personalities tend to be more _____, often expecting that good things will happen.
No one could beat Paul at running. He has won the running championship _____ for three years.
If you fly from Taipei to Tokyo, you’ll be taking an international, rather than a _____ flight.
Jack is very proud of his fancy new motorcycle. He has been _____ to all his friends about how cool it looks and how fast it runs.
The ideas about family have changed _____ in the past twenty years. For example, my grandfather was one of ten children in his family, but I am the only child.
The chairperson of the meeting asked everyone to speak up instead of _____ their opinions among themselves.
Although Mr. Chen is rich, he is a very _____ person and is never willing to spend any money to help those who are in need.
If you want to know what your dreams mean, now there are websites you can visit to help you _____ them.
The memory _____ of the new computer has been increased so that more information can be stored.
All the new students were given one minute to _____ introduce themselves to the whole class.
His dark brown jacket had holes in the elbows and had _____ to light brown, but he continued to wear it.
Everyone in our company enjoys working with Jason. He’s got all the qualities that make a _____ partner.
Eyes are sensitive to light. Looking at the sun _____ could damage our eyes.
We were forced to _____ our plan for the weekend picnic because of the bad weather.
Three people are running for mayor. All three _____ seem confident that they will be elected, but we won’t know until the outcome of the election is announced.
If you _____ a traffic law, such as drinking and driving, you may not drive for some time.
Applying to college means sending in applications, writing study plans, and so on. It’s a long _____, and it makes students nervous.
Dr. Chu’s speech on the new energy source attracted great _____ from the audience at the conference.
Everyone in the office must attend the meeting tomorrow. There are no _____ allowed.
To make fresh lemonade, cut the lemon in half, _____ the juice into a bowl, and then add as much water and sugar as you like.
Buddhism is the _____ religion in Thailand, with 90% of the total population identified as Buddhists.
When I open a book, I look first at the table of ______ to get a general idea of the book and to see which chapters I might be interested in reading.
The children were so _____ to see the clown appear on stage that they laughed, screamed, and clapped their hands happily.
Typhoon Maggie brought to I-lan County a huge amount of rainfall, much greater than the _____ rainfall of the season in the area.
Mr. Lin is a very ________ writer; he publishes at least five novels every year.
Using a heating pad or taking warm baths can sometimes help to _____ pain in the lower back.
Peter stayed up late last night, so he drank a lot of coffee this morning to keep himself _____ in class.
Due to _______, prices for daily necessities have gone up and we have to pay more for the same items now.
The government is doing its best to ____ the cultures of the tribal people for fear that they may soon die out.
I could not ______ the sweet smell from the bakery, so I walked in and bought a fresh loaf of bread.
Steve has several meetings to attend every day; therefore, he has to work on a very _____ schedule.
Michael Phelps, an American swimmer, broke seven world records and won eight gold medals in men’s swimming _____ in the 2008 Olympics.
Those college students work at the orphanage on a _____ basis, helping the children with their studies without receiving any pay.
Studies show that asking children to do house _____, such as taking out the trash or doing the dishes, helps them grow into responsible adults.
John has been scolded by his boss for over ten minutes now. _____, she is not happy about his being late again.
Since the orange trees suffered _____ damage from a storm in the summer, the farmers are expecting a sharp decline in harvests this winter.
Typhoon Morakot claimed more than six hundred lives in early August of 2009, making it the most serious natural _____ in Taiwan in recent decades.
Robert was the only _____ to the car accident. The police had to count on him to find out exactly how the accident happened.
Badly injured in the car accident, Jason could _____ move his legs and was sent to the hospital right away.
Steve’s description of the place was so _____ that I could almost picture it in my mind.
When people feel uncomfortable or nervous, they may _____ their arms across their chests as if to protect themselves.
The doors of these department stores slide open _____ when you approach them. You don’t have to open them yourself.
Nicole is a _____ language learner. Within a short period of time, she has developed a good command of Chinese and Japanese.
With rising oil prices, there is an increasing _____ for people to ride bicycles to work.
This information came from a very _____ source, so you don’t have to worry about being cheated.
We hope that there will be no war in the world and that all people live in peace and _____ with each other.
To have a full discussion of the issue, the committee spent a whole hour _____ their ideas at the meeting.
While adapting to western ways of living, many Asian immigrants in the US still try hard to _____ their own cultures and traditions.
With the worsening of global economic conditions, it seems wiser and more _____ to keep cash in the bank rather than to invest in the stock market.
Under the _____ of newly elected president Barack Obama, the US is expected to turn a new page in politics and economy.
Rapid advancement in motor engineering makes it _____ possible to build a flying car in the near future.
When you take photos, you can move around to shoot the target object from different _____.
Students were asked to _____ or rewrite their compositions based on the teacher’s comments.
Besides lung cancer, another _____ of smoking is wrinkles, a premature sign of aging.
Amy did not _____ changes in the course schedule and therefore missed the class.
It is not easy for old people to _____ their backs, so they need help when their backs itch.
Mary is suffering from a stomachache and needs to eat food which is easy to _____.
Since our classroom is not air-conditioned, we have to _____ the heat during the hot summer days.
Sue is so _____ that she always breaks something when she is shopping at a store.
Ann enjoyed going to the flower market. She believed that the _____ of flowers refreshed her mind.
The profits of Prince Charles’s organic farm go to _____ to help the poor and the sick.
Jack was given the rare _____ of using the president’s office, which made others quite jealous.
This new computer is obviously _____ to the old one because it has many new functions.
Simon loves his work. To him, work always comes first, and family and friends are _____.
Although your plans look good, you have to be _____ and consider what you can actually do.
Built under the sea in 1994, the _____ between England and France connects the UK more closely with mainland Europe.
This tour package is very appealing, and that one looks _____ attractive. I don’t know which one to choose.
Hseu Fang-yi, a young Taiwanese dancer, recently _____ at Lincoln Center in New York and won a great deal of praise.
The police searched the house of the suspect _____. They almost turned the whole house upside down.
The movie director adapted this year’s bestseller into a hit and made a ______.
Wang Chien-ming, the Yankees’ best pitcher last year, already showed his great _____ for baseball when he was still a teenager.
Although Jeffery had to keep two part-time jobs to support his family, he never ______ his studies. In fact, he graduated with honors.
If it is too cold in this room, you can ______ the air conditioner to make yourself feel comfortable.
This course will provide students with a solid ______ for research. It is highly recommended for those who plan to go to graduate school.
Peter is now living on a ______ of NT$100 per day. He cannot afford any recreational activities.
Amy succeeded in ______ for a raise though her boss didn’t agree to increase her salary at first.
Ms. Li’s business ______ very quickly. She opened her first store two years ago; now she has fifty stores all over the country.
Ruth is a very ____ person. She cannot take any criticism and always finds excuses to justify herself.
It’s a pity that you have to leave so soon. I ______ hope that you will come back very soon.
We human beings may live without clothes, but food and air are ______ to our life.
The manager ______ without hesitation after he had been offered a better job in another company.
Many important legal ______ concerning the tragic incident have now been preserved in the museum.
I’m not sure exactly how much scholarship you’ll receive, but it will _____ cover your major expenses.
Tom was very ill a week ago, but now he looks healthy. We are ______ by his quick recovery.
If we can _____ to, we will take a vacation abroad in the summer.
A _____ mistake found in parenthood is that parents often set unrealistic goals for their children.
Some words, such as “sandwich” and “hamburger,” were _____ the names of people or even towns.
Have you ever _____ how the ancient Egyptians created such marvelous feats of engineering as the pyramids?
Mr. Johnson was disappointed at his students for having a passive learning _____.
Anne dreaded giving a speech before three hundred people; even thinking about it made her _____.
I had to _____ Jack’s invitation to the party because it conflicted with an important business meeting.
Selling fried chicken at the night market doesn’t seem to be a decent business, but it is actually quite _____.
The passengers _____ escaped death when a bomb exploded in the subway station, killing sixty people.
Jerry didn’t _____ his primary school classmate Mary until he listened to her self-introduction.
With the completion of several public _____ projects, such as the MRT, commuting to work has become easier for people living in the suburbs.
With a good _____ of both Chinese and English, Miss Lin was assigned the task of oral interpretation for the visiting American delegation.
I am studying so hard for the forthcoming entrance exam that I do not have the _____ of a free weekend to rest.
Kim was completely _____ after jogging in the hot sun all afternoon; she had little energy left.
When Jason failed to pay his bill, the network company _____ his Internet connection.
As computers are getting less expensive, they are _______ used in schools and offices today.
Mr. Chang always tries to answer all questions from his students. He will not _____ any of them even if they may sound stupid.
Irene does not throw away used envelopes. She ____ them by using them for taking telephone messages.
Cheese, powdered milk, and yogurt are common milk ____.
options_ch: 艺术、电影等方面的作品

questions: Although he is a chef, Roberto _____ cooks his own meals.
Due to the yearly bonus system, the 100 ________ positions in this high-tech company have attracted many applicants from around the island.
If you want to borrow magazines, tapes, or CDs, you can visit the library. They are all ______ there.
The fire in the fireworks factory in Changhua set off a series of powerful _________ and killed four people.
A good government official has to ________ the temptation of money and make the right decision.
The drug dealer was ________ by the police while he was selling cocaine to a high school student.
The rise of oil prices made scientists search for new energy resources to ______ oil.
Without much contact with the outside world for many years, John found many technological inventions _____ to him.
The medicine you take for a cold may cause _____; try not to drive after you take it.
To gain more ______, some legislators would get into violent physical fights so that they may appear in TV news reports.
To live an efficient life, we have to arrange the things to do in order of _____ and start with the most important ones.
I called the airline to ______ my flight reservation a week before I left for Canada.
In order to write a report on stars, we decided to ______ the stars in the sky every night.
Julie wants to buy a ______ computer so that she can carry it around when she travels.
My grandmother likes to surprise people. She never calls ______ to inform us of her visits.
As the tallest building in the world, Taipei 101 has become a new ______ of Taipei City.
Many scholars and experts from all over the world will be invited to attend this yearly ______ on drug control.
John had failed to pay his phone bills for months, so his telephone was ______ last week.
The organic food products are made of natural ingredients, with no ______ flavors added.
Jessica is a very religious girl; she believes that she is always ______ supported by her god.
Jane usually buys things on ______. Her purchases seem to be driven by some sudden force or desire.
The week-long rainfall has ______ landslides and flooding in the mountain areas.
In the cross-lake swimming race, a boat will be _____ in case of an emergency.
The ground is slippery. Hold onto the rope and don’t ______.
______ the weather, the athletic meetings will be held on time.
If people keep polluting the rivers, no fish there will survive ______.
